Pre-Game Insights: Isaiah Collier will likely get a shot taking over the minutes that Patty Mills is currently occupying (about 15 minutes per game)
Miscellaneous Highlights: Isaiah Collier is rehabbing a hamstring injury, and his return to the court is uncertain
The Jazz are 0-5 on the season
Others: Justin Zanik, Jazz general manager, and Utah Jazz draft pick Isaiah Collier speak during a press conference at the Utah Jazz Zions Bank Basketball Campus in Salt Lake City on Tuesday, July 2, 2024
